task.title: Viewing the transfer configuration statistics by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can view the automatic log transfer statistics by using the stat LogAutoTransfer command.

step.cmd: To view the automatic log transfer statistics, enter the following command:

info.note: The command must be capitalized as shown.

taskbody.result:
The command returns the following information:
Whether automatic transfers are enabled.
The number of successful file transfers.
The number of failed file transfers.
The date and time of the last successful file transfer.
The date and time of the last failed file transfer.
taskbody.example: The following example shows the statistics of the automatic log transfers: stat LogAutoTransfer Auto-offload state: ON Last stats reset: 3/5/14 4:07:25 PM GMT Successful transfers: 10 Failed transfers: 0 Last success: 3/5/2014 4:13pm GMT Last failure: N/A
